overview: Award winning director Nic Andrews weaves artistic vision and stunning imagery to form the most erotic masterpiece of our time. INTIMATE EXPRESSIONS explores the relationship between imagination and reality as the creations of an artist, played by Jewel De'Nyle, independently take form and entwine in a sensual embrace so passionate that they bridge the boundaries between tangible reality and the vast possibilities of the mind's eye. Expression has many forms. They appear and they pass. Intimate Expressions however, remain with us forever.
title: Intimate Expressions
